title: Ignite is a really overrated summoner spell

embed.description: Whats the most overrated summoner spell being used? Answer: Here are the reasons why: Have you ever asked yourself after killing someone with your combo + ignite, whether you actually needed the ignite to get the kill in the first place?

body: Check out this article discussing why ignite might be the most overrated summoner spell being frequently used!

replies.body: Teleport is the most overrated, ignite top is where its at
tp is just mediocre now tbh
I won a game with teleport
Its rated so highly because lower ELO people don't know how to calculate or respect lethals. High elo mostly uses it as a niche grevious wounds

i actually disagree with that, in low elo, ignite means a lot less because there are so many more lopsided fights

take an extreme example like the lcs...any 1v1 fight u see in lane will always be very very close because both players really know the limits to their champions and wouldnt have chosen to fight to begin with if they knew they didnt have a chance of winning

in these close fight scenarios, ignite can really make the difference whereas if someone was to go stomp in the lower ranks, they should easily be able to win fights without the need for ignite

The reason the know they have a chance of winning is because they can calculate how much damage they will do with their kit + ignite, ie their "lethal". The enemy laner can know that too, so thats why you see them backing often, because the other laner most likely will not mess up a trade or all in. Lower ELO players, however, won't realize that with the addition of ignite they would die, so if you can capitalize on that they usually will die. AKA overstaying.
It halves all healing and does unreducable damage. Basically a coin toss between exhaust for lategame debuff and ignite for early game snowball.

yes i definately shoulda mentioned that ignite is particularly good vs champs with heal..though i think more often or not people choose to take ignite even in games where those healing champs arent in

I usually only use ignite now if they have someone who can heal such as {{champion:122}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:16}} and even then {{summoner:14}} there's items that can be bought to guarantee the same effect.
It doesn't mention the fact that it reduces healing which is great against people like Mundo or Vlad and most adc's (which is why assassins take it a lot as their target is usually an adc)
pretty neat points, too bad i adc a lot so doesnt help me in particular
